feature_model.name: Key_Word_In_Context_index_systems

meta.data: This feature model represents Parnas' Key Word in Context index system

Jing Sun, Hongyu Zhang, Yuan Fang, and Li Hai Wang. Formal semantics and verification for feature modeling. Engineering of Complex Computer Systems, 2005. ICECCS 2005. Proceedings of 10th IEEE International Conference on, pages 303â€“312, June 2005

feature_model.feature_tree: :r kwic :m input_output :g [1,*] : file : console :m circular_shift :m shift_data :g [1,1] : implicit : explicit (explicit) :o compression (compression) :m shift_processing :g [1,1] : each_line : all_lines (all_lines) :o noise_words :m alpha_sort :m order :g [1,1] : descendant : ascendant :m case_sensitivity :g [1,1] : sensitive : insensitive :m arch_style :g [1,1] : shared_data : adt : implicit_invocation : pipe_and_filter (pipe_and_filter)
feature_model.constraints: c1: ~compression or explicit c2: ~pipe_and_filter or all_lines c3: ~pipe_and_filter or explicit
